title: Available Positions in the ADVIS lab
contents:
Positions in the ADVIS Lab   Postdoc (in Databases and/or Semantic Web only)  PhD student     Postdoc Position - Available
immediately  Please follow instructions in the ad .    PhD Position - Available
immediately  Please apply by providing:   For students already at UIC: the names of two UIC Computer Science
	professors as references or one UIC Computer Science professor if you have taken a course with me.  For students recently accepted to UIC: the names of two professors
	as references.  Resume with course grades (PDF).  One page letter of intent, where you explain why you believe you
	are suitable for the job (PDF).   For PhD positions apply only if you already have a Masters degree.  If interested, send email to advis@cs.uic.edu with subject: PhD position .
